title: Tiny cluster
subtitle: Two nodes. Spot instances. SGE scheduler.
body: A fixed size cluster of 2 compute nodes.  The compute nodes use spot instances with a reserve price of 0.3.  It uses the Slurm scheduler.

title: Small cluster
subtitle: Autoscaling upto 8 nodes. Spot instances. SGE scheduler.
body: An autoscaling cluster, scaling upto a maximum of 8 compute nodes.  The compute nodes use spot instances with a reserve price of 0.3.  It uses the SGE scheduler.

title: Big cluster
subtitle: Autoscaling upto 16 nodes. Dedicated instances. SGE scheduler.
body: An autoscaling cluster, scaling upto a maximum of 16 compute nodes.  The compute nodes use dedicated instances to ensure your workload completes.  It uses the SGE scheduler.

title: Huge cluster
subtitle: Autoscaling upto 512 nodes. Dedicated instances. SGE scheduler.
body: An autoscaling cluster, scaling upto a maximum of 512 compute nodes.  The compute nodes use dedicated instances to ensure your workload completes.  It uses the SGE scheduler.
